value.title: PowerBI.tips - Tutorial - Monkey Tool Introduction - Part 1

Additionally, at the end of the video we also show how to add a Grand Total for each bar column.    Visit our Site: https://powerbi.tips/

value.title: Substring in DAX   How to get Part of String Field in Power BI Using DAX Expression
value.excerpt: Substring is one of the most common functions in many languages, However, there is no such function in DAX. There is a very simple way of doing it, which I am going to explain in this post. Substring means getting part of a string, for example from "Reza Rad", if I want to get the start starting from

value.title: Filtering a measure in DAX Studio
value.excerpt: DAX Studio can evaluate one or more measures in a query. Marco Russo shows how to apply filters to a measure executed in DAX Studio. Continuous learning to improve your productivity!  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/ DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.org/

value.title: Mark as Date Table in Power BI
value.excerpt: Tabular models (including Power BI) require marking the Date table as a date table to get appropriate results with time intelligence calculations. This video explains why this setting is required. Article and download: https://sql.bi/670749
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hrhEjg9yYvE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Create paginated reports
value.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Identify anomalies by routing data via IoT Hub to a built-in ML model in Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure IoT Hub message routing, and Stream Analytics anomaly detection. Start by creating an app that simulates issues with conveyor belt vibration. Then, use the Azure portal to route all the data for archiving in blob storage. Finish by routing the vibration data to anomaly detection, using a built-in ML model.

images.title: Identify anomalies by routing data via IoT Hub to a built-in ML model in Azure Stream Analytics

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Microsoft Power Platform enables you to create custom solutions with familiar, intuitive technology. Learn how Power Platform supports faster data collection, surfaces real-time insights, and empowers users to make informed, actionable decisions.

images.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos

value.title: 3 ways to embed Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will look at three ways that you can embed Power BI into your website or application. This includes the Publish to Web feature, using the REST APIs and the new Power BI Embedded service within Microsoft Azure.  Watch the behind the scenes video over on Guy in a Cube - https://youtu.be/OqbVZfFhEzA
